channel.title: admin on Xu Du
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Xu Du

item.description: I am a Tech Lead Research Scientist/Software Engineer in the Automated Machine Learning team at Facebook Ads. My team’s work focus on optimizing, managing, and deploying Facebook Ads models at scale. During 2013-2019, I was a graduate researcher working with Prof.Ashutosh Sabharwal at Rice University.
